attributes.action: remove the christian themes from the government, the monarchy and anything government run
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this day and age not everyone is christian so many people find it offensive when terms such as 'God save the queen' are used. If people choose not to sing the national anthem it is most likely not disrespect for the queen but for their disbelief in god. Schools are overwhelmed with prayers and hymns also and they should be removed.
